author: AP
title: Italy tops 19,000 coronavirus deaths
description: Deaths rose by 3.2%, or 619, to 19,468, while the number of people who tested positive for the virus reached 152,271, an increase of 4,694, or 3.1%.
content:
Italy has topped 19,000 deaths and 150,000 cases of the coronavirus.
 The milestones were hit on Saturday, even as the country continued to see a slight decrease in numbers of people hospitalized and in intensive care.
 Deaths rose by 3.2%, or 619, to 19,46… [+506 chars]
